src_text: Mu 1994, ishi mpasase shalengele ukupangwa kwa kacalo akaipangilefye akene aka Transnistria Republic ku kabanga ka Moldova, akakwata ubuteko bwakako ne ndalama shakako nomba ishishaisuminishiwa ne calo icili conse icamu UN.
ref_text: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
hyp_text: In 1994, the Transnistria Republic, which had declared independence from Moldova in 1990, was recognized by only three other states, and the UN refused to recognize it.
